articles.title: Actress Barbie Hsu marries former boyfriend, South Korean musician DJ Koo, three months after her divorce - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The two had dated for a year in the late 1990s and he got back in touch with her after hearing about her divorce from Chinese businessman, Wang Xiaofei.
articles.content:
Koo added that he had reached out to the singer-actress after hearing about her divorce.
When I heard the news of her divorce, I dug out her number from over 20 years ago and contacted her. Thankful… [+906 chars]

articles.title: Asia Shares Dip, Oil Prices Gyrate As Ukraine Talks Make Little Progress - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Oil prices gyrated and Asian shares fell on Tuesday as Ukraine peace talks made little headway and the prospect of a ban on oil imports from Russia triggered investor fears over inflation and slowing economic growth.
articles.content:
Japan's Nikkei sank 0.3% while Australian shares were down 0.24% amid a sea of red across Asian markets.

articles.title: Turning Red review: Pixar’s emotional action movie is one of its best - Polygon
articles.description: Pixar’s Turning Red, from Bao director Domee Shi, is a great film that embraces quirkiness, Asian-American life, and big action. The movie releases on Disney Plus on March 11. Here’s how to tell if it’s for you and the kids in your life.
articles.content: At this point, the Pixar movie stereotype has become a meme: People go into the animation studios projects expecting a family-friendly story focused on nonhuman protagonists given surprising depth an… [+5548 chars]
